text: ivarkaḷ pūmiyil pirayāṇam ceytu ivarkaḷukku muṉ iruntavarkaḷiṉ muṭivu eppaṭiyiruntatu eṉpataip pārkka villaiyā? Avarkaḷ, palattālum, pūmiyil (viṭṭuc ceṉṟa pūrva)ciṉṉaṅkaḷālum ivarkaḷaiviṭa valimaiyuṭaiyavarkaḷākavē iruntārkaḷ - āṉāl avarkaḷiṉ pāvaṅkaḷiṉ kāraṇamāka avarkaḷai allāh piṭittuk koṇṭāṉ; iṉṉum allāhviṭamiruntu avarkaḷaik kāppāṟṟa evarum illai
